thread.title: Carole Rogerson
thread.title_full: Zopa Ltd reviewed by Carole Rogerson

author: Carole Rogerson
title: Carole Rogerson
text: I haven't got a great credit rating due to past financial problems but Zopa approved my application with a really reasonable interest rate (<10% on a Â£3000 loan). Usually any suggestion of a poor financial history and the interest rates skyrocket! I couldn't recommend them any more highly (I found out about them on Martin Lewis' moneysavingexpert website so I knew they weren't likely to be dodgy).
